eu.digitisation.math

Class Counter<Type>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      • java.util.TreeMap<Type,Integer>
        • eu.digitisation.math.Counter<Type>
  • Type Parameters:
    Type - the class of objects being counted
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Map<Type,Integer>, NavigableMap<Type,Integer>, SortedMap<Type,Integer>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BiCounter

    public class Counter<Type>
extends TreeMap<Type,Integer>
    Counts number of different objects, a map between objects and integers which can be incremented and decremented.
    Version:
    2012.06.07
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
